verses.name: Ezekiel 24:1
verses.text: Again in the ninth year, in the tenth month, in the tenth day of the month, the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:2
verses.text: Son of man, write thee the name of the day, even of this same day: the king of Babylon set himself against Jerusalem this same day.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:3
verses.text: And utter a parable unto the rebellious house, and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord God; Set on a pot, set it on, and also pour water into it:
